Class Complex

java.lang.Object
  Complex

public class Complex
extends java.lang.Object

The Complex class represents a complex number, in a + bi format.

Since:
2013-3-15
Version:
0.9
Author:
William Woodruff

equals

public boolean equals(Complex c)
Compares this Complex instance to another, checking for equality.

Two Complexes are considered equal if they meet two conditions: Both must have equal real parts AND imaginary parts.

Returns:
true if the Complexes are equal, false otherwise

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Creates a String that describes the Complex object in a + bi format.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a String containing the real and imaginary parts in a + bi format
